name: The Network (M-Ansley)
description:
The Network is a dialogue exploration game about the death of a friend group. It explores social loss, breakdown, and cynicism, placing you in the role of an opportunistic or sympathetic friend at a surreal afterparty. 

So make yourself at home in the company of old friends. Talk about what matters to them, find out where they stand on the latest controversy, placate and reassure them or add fuel to the fire.

Just be careful: you can't take back what you say. 

***

Estimated running time: 15-20 minutes

Recommended settings:

  • Volume 50%
  • 1080p or 4K
  • Recommended for Windows

Developed using Unity3D, ProBuilder, and Yarn Spinner.

For more information about this game, see: 

https://allthingsgamedesign.wordpress.com/2020/05/08/the-network-post-mortem/
